rows.label: tev035601_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev035601_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Nococche about the Ma-non ship.

rows.label: tev035601_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss

rows.label: tev035601_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Nococche if anything is troubling her.

rows.label: tev035601_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask Nococche about the Ganglion.

rows.label: tev035601_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Nococche about the Ganglion.

rows.label: tev035601_MSG0001
rows.name:
Since arriving on Mira, we've lost all contact with the
Ma-non fleet, you see? So we we have no idea where
the others are.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035601_MSG0002
rows.name:
But I can tell you this: our civilian vessel is nothing
compared to the planetoid-sized goliaths in the rest
of our fleet, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035601_MSG0003
rows.name:
Those ships have been to myriad planets and boarded
a whole slew of xenoforms, all of whom contribute to
our intellectual communion, if you follow?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035601_MSG0004
rows.name:
I can only hope that our own ship becomes a similar
hub of of culture one day. It's my private wish, I guess?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035601_MSG0007
rows.name:
Did you know that I have traveled to more planets than
I can count on on these two hands?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035601_MSG0008
rows.name:
I have met the inhabitants of these planets, and they
have each enriched me with their own surprising dose
of culture, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035601_MSG0009
rows.name:
I was hoping that Mira would lead to similar
introductions to equally stimulating xenoformic races,
but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035601_MSG0010
rows.name:
Well, it seems that most of the aliens inhabiting Mira
are violent sycophants who serve the Ganglion's wishes,
am I right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035601_MSG0011
rows.name:
Don't you know any NICE species who live on Mira?
If so, maybe you could...introduce me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035601_MSG0015
rows.name:
I hear that some races who obey the Ganglion were
forced into servitude, correct?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035601_MSG0021
rows.name:
Surely these races are watching humanity very closely,
don't you think?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035601_MSG0022
rows.name:
The Ganglion are afraid of humans, which makes you
a beacon of hopeâ€”or even a potential emancipator?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035601_MSG0023
rows.name:
If you meet any xenoforms who seem open to
diplomacy, you should maybe listen to what they have
to say, all right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035601_MSG0030
rows.name:
It is said other races have tried in their own ways to
defy the Ganglion, haven't they?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035601_MSG0031
rows.name:
But they each failed, and either were subjugated in turn
or else...annihilated? Er, as I hear it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035601_MSG0032
rows.name:
So you humans are the first to ever really stand up
to them, understand?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035601_MSG0033
rows.name:
I feel as though I am witnessing history in the making,
don't you? It is a very pleasant feeling indeed![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035601_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Nococche about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035601_MSG1001
rows.name:
I was walking along the other day when I got sprayed
with the the nastiest liquid! So gross, am I right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035601_MSG1002
rows.name:
I didn't know what to do other than gag, you know?
But thankfully, this Zaruboggan fellow named Atheron
came along and and saved the day.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035601_MSG1003
rows.name:
How do I even put it into words? One wave of that
staff of his, and the icky mess that had mucked up my
day just...vanished. Almost like magic, you see?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035601_MSG1004
rows.name:
Well, we got to talking, and I realized I had found a
true friend. So here we we are, I guess?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035601_MSG1005
rows.name: New LA is quite the city. Never a dull moment, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035601_SEL2021
rows.name: Ask Nococche about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035601_MSG2001
rows.name:
I have been around the galactic block, so to speak,
and have forged relationships with many a xenoform
in my time, understand?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035601_MSG2002
rows.name:
But Atheron is the first who I feel I can share anything
with, you know? He is a true and genuine friend.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035601_MSG2003
rows.name:
I hope that we will still be telling each other stories
like this in the centuries to come, maybe?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev035601_MSG2004
rows.name:
Thank you for bringing us together, okay?
I hope my friendship with you lasts every bit as long.[ST:wait ]
